article_title: Listen to new song from Morrissey, “The Bullfighter Dies”
article_text:
Topics: cool culture, innovation, Morrissey, Music, new song, spoken word, Video, Innovation News, Entertainment News

There’s a bit of touring drama surrounding Morrissey at the moment: He cancelled the remainder of his U.S. tour due to a respiratory infection, and subsequently blamed his opening act for contracting said illness.

Despite this, his latest album, “World Peace Is None of Your Business,” is due out on July 15. And today Morrissey shared a new track from the album, titled “The Bullfighter Dies.” Listen below:

As with two of his previously released tracks from this upcoming album, Morrissey has also released a spoken word video to accompany “The Bullfighter Dies.” The video can be watched below:

h/t Pitchfork
